column2: Pzena Investment Management, Inc. is a value-oriented investment management company. The company is headquartered in New York City, New York and currently employs 106 full-time employees. The firm is the sole managing member of Pzena Investment Management, LLC. Pzena Investment Management, LLC is an investment management company. The firm also serves as the general partner of Pzena Investment Management, LP. The firm offers institutional investment products to public and corporate pension funds, endowments, foundations and certain commingled vehicles geared toward institutional investors. The firm also offers access to certain of its global and non-United States strategies through private placement vehicles and collective investment trusts. Pzena Investment Management, LLC is its operating company. Pzena Investment Management, LLC consists of Class A and Class B membership units.
